title: First Quantum Said to Seek Buyer for Turkish Copper Mine
description: First Quantum Minerals Ltd. is looking to sell its copper and zinc mine in Turkey as it seeks to strengthen its balance sheet, according to people familiar with the situation.
content: First Quantum Minerals Ltd. is looking to sell its copper and zinc mine in Turkey as it seeks to strengthen its balance sheet, according to people familiar with the situation.
